issue.title: Remove unused fields from operator API

repository.name: istio

issue.body:
**Please provide a description of this PR:**

Removes both `GlobalConfig.ConfigRootNamespace` and `GlobalConfig.DefaultConfigVisibilitySettings` from the operator API. Both are unused in the manifests.


Part of: https://github.com/istio/istio/issues/51987

issue.title: post upgrading istio from 1.22 to 1.23 version then google kubernetes engine pods are not getting up

labels.name: lifecycle/stale
labels.description: Indicates a PR or issue hasn't been manipulated by an Istio team member for a while

labels.name: lifecycle/automatically-closed
labels.description: Indicates a PR or issue that has been closed automatically.

repository.name: istio
repository.description: Connect, secure, control, and observe services.

issue.body:
### Is this the right place to submit this?

- [x] This is not a security vulnerability or a crashing bug
- [x] This is not a question about how to use Istio

### Bug Description

Hi Folks,

As i have tried to upgrade istio from 1.22 to 1.23 version then my istio.yaml file is throwing below outputs prior proceeding with upgrade but post commenting out 3 flags **useMCP**, **enableProtocolSniffingForInbound**, **enableProtocolSniffingForOutbound** then i am able to proceed with upgrade but post upgrade no pods are getting up all getting failed to deploy in google kubernetes engine.

here are the outputs.
1. istioctl verify-install -f default.yaml

Run the command with the --force flag if you want to ignore the validation error and proceed.
 IstioOperator: .istio-system: unknown field "useMCP" in v1alpha1.GlobalConfig
Checked 0 custom resource definitions
Checked 0 Istio Deployments
! No Istio installation found: unknown field "useMCP" in v1alpha1.GlobalConfig
Error: no Istio installation found

after commenting out **useMCP** flag in default.yaml file.
tracer:
        datadog: {}
        lightstep: {}
        stackdriver: {}
        zipkin: {}
      #useMCP: false

then got another output.

2. istioctl verify-install -f default.yaml

Run the command with the --force flag if you want to ignore the validation error and proceed.
 IstioOperator: .istio-system: unknown field "enableProtocolSniffingForInbound" in v1alpha1.PilotConfig
Checked 0 custom resource definitions
Checked 0 Istio Deployments
! No Istio installation found: unknown field "enableProtocolSniffingForInbound" in v1alpha1.PilotConfig
Error: no Istio installation found

then comment out **enableProtocolSniffingForInbound** flag in default.yaml file

that's how i comment out **enableProtocolSniffingForInbound** flag

pilot:
      autoscaleEnabled: true
      autoscaleMax: 5
      autoscaleMin: 1
      configMap: true
      cpu:
        targetAverageUtilization: 80
        #enableProtocolSniffingForInbound: true
      enableProtocolSniffingForOutbound: true
      env: {}
      image: pilot
      keepaliveMaxServerConnectionAge: 30m
      nodeSelector: {}
      podLabels: {}
      replicaCount: 1
      traceSampling: 1

3. istioctl verify-install -f default.yaml

Run the command with the --force flag if you want to ignore the validation error and proceed.
 IstioOperator: .istio-system: unknown field "enableProtocolSniffingForOutbound" in v1alpha1.PilotConfig
Checked 0 custom resource definitions
Checked 0 Istio Deployments
! No Istio installation found: unknown field "enableProtocolSniffingForOutbound" in v1alpha1.PilotConfig
Error: no Istio installation found

after comment out **enableProtocolSniffingForOutbound** flag in default.yaml file.


### Version

```Text
istioctl version
client version: 1.22.5
control plane version: 1.22.5
data plane version: 1.22.5 (2 proxies)

kubectl version --short
Client Version: v1.26.15-dispatcher
Kustomize Version: v4.5.7
Server Version: v1.31.6-gke.1020000
```

### Additional Information

this is the istio default.yaml file that's i am using to upgrade from 1.22 to 1.23

apiVersion: install.istio.io/v1alpha1
kind: IstioOperator
spec:
  components:
    base:
      enabled: true
    cni:
      enabled: false
    egressGateways:
    - enabled: true
      name: istio-egressgateway
    ingressGateways:
    - enabled: true
      k8s:
        serviceAnnotations:
          cloud.google.com/load-balancer-type: internal
        service:
          type: NodePort
            # loadBalancerIP: 104.199.107.42
      name: istio-ingressgateway
    istiodRemote:
      enabled: false
    pilot:
      enabled: true
  hub: docker.io/istio
  meshConfig:
#    accessLogFile: "/dev/stdout"
    outboundTrafficPolicy:
      mode: REGISTRY_ONLY #ALLOW_ANY
    defaultConfig:
      proxyMetadata: {}
    enablePrometheusMerge: true
  profile: default
  tag: 1.23.5
  values:
    base:
      enableCRDTemplates: false
      validationURL: ""
    defaultRevision: ""
    gateways:
      istio-egressgateway:
        autoscaleEnabled: true
        env: {}
        name: istio-egressgateway
        secretVolumes:
        - mountPath: /etc/istio/egressgateway-certs
          name: egressgateway-certs
          secretName: istio-egressgateway-certs
        - mountPath: /etc/istio/egressgateway-ca-certs
          name: egressgateway-ca-certs
          secretName: istio-egressgateway-ca-certs
        type: ClusterIP
      istio-ingressgateway:
        autoscaleEnabled: true
        env: {}
        name: istio-ingressgateway
        secretVolumes:
        - mountPath: /etc/istio/ingressgateway-certs
          name: ingressgateway-certs
          secretName: istio-ingressgateway-certs
        - mountPath: /etc/istio/ingressgateway-ca-certs
          name: ingressgateway-ca-certs
          secretName: istio-ingressgateway-ca-certs
        type: LoadBalancer
    global:
      configValidation: true
      defaultNodeSelector: {}
      defaultPodDisruptionBudget:
        enabled: true
      defaultResources:
        requests:
          cpu: 10m
      imagePullPolicy: ""
      imagePullSecrets: []
      istioNamespace: istio-system
      istiod:
        enableAnalysis: false
      jwtPolicy: third-party-jwt
      logAsJson: false
      logging:
        level: default:info
      meshNetworks: {}
      mountMtlsCerts: false
      multiCluster:
        clusterName: ""
        enabled: false
      network: ""
      omitSidecarInjectorConfigMap: false
        #oneNamespace: false
      operatorManageWebhooks: false
      pilotCertProvider: istiod
      priorityClassName: ""
      proxy:
        autoInject: enabled
        clusterDomain: cluster.local
        componentLogLevel: misc:error
        enableCoreDump: false
        excludeIPRanges: ""
        excludeInboundPorts: ""
        excludeOutboundPorts: ""
        image: proxyv2
        includeIPRanges: '*'
        logLevel: warning
        privileged: false
        readinessFailureThreshold: 30
        readinessInitialDelaySeconds: 1
        readinessPeriodSeconds: 2
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        statusPort: 15020
        tracer: zipkin
      proxy_init:
        image: proxyv2
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 10Mi
      sds:
        token:
          aud: istio-ca
      sts:
        servicePort: 0
      tracer:
        datadog: {}
        lightstep: {}
        stackdriver: {}
        zipkin: {}
        #useMCP: false
    istiodRemote:
      injectionURL: ""
    pilot:
      autoscaleEnabled: true
      autoscaleMax: 5
      autoscaleMin: 1
      configMap: true
      cpu:
        targetAverageUtilization: 80
        #enableProtocolSniffingForInbound: true
        #enableProtocolSniffingForOutbound: true
      env: {}
      image: pilot
      keepaliveMaxServerConnectionAge: 30m
      nodeSelector: {}
      podLabels: {}
      replicaCount: 1
      traceSampling: 1
    telemetry:
      enabled: true
      v2:
        enabled: true
          #metadataExchange:
          #wasmEnabled: false
        prometheus:
          enabled: true
            #wasmEnabled: false
        stackdriver:
          #configOverride: {}
          enabled: false
            #logging: false
            #monitoring: false
            #topology: false
